dt-option.name: sortingFixed
dt-option.summary: Sorting to always be applied to the table
dt-option.description:
The option works in tendem with the `dt-init sorting` option, and is identical in its usage, but differs in that the sorting defined in this option will always be applied to the table before any user selected sorting.
This may be useful if you a column (visible or hidden) which must always be sorted upon first - a priority order or index column for example, or for grouping similar rows together.

example.title: The first column will always be sorted upon first
